titleStmt.title: William Godwin's Diary
titleStmt.author: William Godwin
titleStmt.funder: Leverhulme Foundation and the John Fell OUP Research Fund

publicationStmt.authority: Published by the Godwin Diary Project, University of Oxford

revisionDesc.change: Dr James Cummings generated this file.

div.ab: Jan. 1. 1790. F. 25 §s written in 89
2. Sa. Dine at Holcroft , with Ja. Aikin, Otley : hear Bishop .

6. W. Separation of H. & sa femme
.
8. Fr. Dine at Hollis's , with Bernard, Kippis, dr Russel, B. & J. Hollis .

Jan. 10. Su. Dine at Holcroft's
. §. 37.

ab.seg: Dine at Mrs Webb's , with W., & Mr & Mrs Jones

div.ab:
18. M. Call on Robinson
&
Hamilton
19. Tu. Dine at Hollis's , with Planta, Blackburne, Towers & J Hollis .

20. W.
Dr Tho. Campbel calls.
Jan. 24. Su. Dine at Holcroft's with miss G . & Marshal.

27. W.
Dr Campbel & B. Hollis call. Dine at B. H.'s with Kent & Jennings .

29. F.
Eudora.

Jan. 31. Su. Dine at Holcroft's
: Dunstan .
Feb. 1. M. Dine at B. Hollis's , with Kippis, Disney, Geddes, Shore, Stone, Belcham & W. Vaughan .
2. Tu. Dine at Hollis's : with B. Hollis, Chelsum & J Hollis .

ab.seg: Tea miss Williams's : with Cadogan, maj. Barry, Hoole, Lewis, Aboyne: & mes Nichols, Barwel, Trefussis, &c.

div.ab:
10. W. Call on Robinson
&
Hamilton
.

12. F. Tea miss Williams's : with Holcroft, Swift, Aboyne: & mes Marriot, Bailey, Paisley : sup at Holcroft's
.

13. Sa.
Dine with the Anti-tests : Fox, Beaufoy, Hoghton, Sawbridge Adair, Watson, Heywood, B. Hollis, Shore, Geddes, Vaughan, Fell, Stone, Wodhul, Listers
. Call on Mrs Webbs
19. F. Act. 2. Dine at Hollis's , with Kippis, Spurling, D. Lister & J. Hollis . Davidson : advena S. Solly

23. Tu. Sup at Holcrofts
.

Feb. 28. Su. Dine at Holcrofts
.
5. F. Dine at Hollis's , with Kippis, Wood, Belcham, Towers, Listers & J. Hollis . Read for A. R.

Mar. 7. Su. Call on J. Hollis
: dine at Holcroft's
.

8. M. House of Commons: Tobacco act,
Capt. Williams's Petition, Quebec .

11. Th.
J. Hollis calls.

13. Sa.
Robinson & Holcroft call.
Mar. 14. Su. Dine at Holcroft's , with miss Godwin .
15. M. Dine at B. Hollis's , with Price, Walker, Jefferies, Dodson, Sharpe & Towers . Hindmarsh's benefit.
16. Tu. Dine at Hollis's , with Shore, Planta, Mansel & J Hollis .

19. F.
Holcroft sups.
23. Tu. Resume A. R. with an interval of ten days.

25. Th.
Robinson calls. Sup at Nicholson's , with Holcroft .
27. Sa. See miss Williams—Love in many Masks .

Mar. 28. Su. Call on
miss Williams
: dine at Holcroft's
.
30. Tu. Dine at Hollis's , with Davidson .
31. W. Dine at Holcroft's , with Crosdil, Shield, Otley & Bicknel .

8. Th.
W. Webb calls.

13. Tu. Dine at Holcroft's
. Enchiridion.

14.W.
Robinson calls.

16. F. Call at Webb's
,
B. Hollis's
&
ms Williams's
. Dine at Hollis's , with B. H., Towers, Lister & J H .

Apr. 18. Su. Dine at Holcroft's
: tea Paradise's, with sir R. A's Truchement , B. Hollis, Rutledge, Planta, Nollekens, Hawkins, Gillies, Russian chaplain, Cyclops .

20. Tu.
J Hollis calls: dine at Webb's , with Mrs Walke & Mr & Mrs Jones .

23. F.
Hanover Square .

ab.seg: Dine at Hollis's , with Planta, J. H. &

div.ab:
May. 1. Sa. Call on Robinson
.
May 2. Su. Dine at Holcroft's , with Nicholson, Davis & miss G .

7. F. Call on B. Hollis
. Tea miss Williams's , with Robertson, Lewis, Aboyne, Ellison, mes. Rn , Douglas, Dedingston, & dr Moore
May 9. Su. Tea Paradise's with B. Hollis, Rutledge, Staunton, Garthshore, Dornford, Gillies & Ede; Raper .

10. M. Call on Sheridan
.

11. Tu. Dine at Robinson's , with L White & Holcroft . sup at Nicholson's
. Write to Watson & the abp.
18. Tu. Dine at Hollis's , with Stovin, Planta & Thorkelin .

19. W.
Mother goes out of town.
21. F. Hear from Watson , send his letter to the abp.

May 23. Su. Dine at Holcroft's
: tea Paradise's , with Hawke, Staunton, F. North, B. Hollis, S. L., Garthshore, Raper, Adair, Forster & Dornfd.{,} Nollekens, Reveley
27. Th. Tea miss Williams's , with Holcroft, & mes Mendez & Marriot .
28. F. Exhibition.

May 30. Su. Dine at Holcroft's
.

31.
M. Curioni, 1st lesson. Hanover Square .
June 1. Tu. Dine at Hollis's , with B. H., Shore, Kippis & Price .

18 Tu.
Call on Robinson
.
9. W. Call on B. Hollis at noon.

11. F.
Dissolution. Call on Robn
.

June 13. Su. Dine at Holcroft's , avec son pere
. See Paradise &; Planta
15. Tu. Dine at Hollis's , with J. H., Davidson & Mills .

ab.emph: Titles of nobility abolished by the national assembly.

div.ab: June 27. Su. Dine at Holcroft's , avec son pere & Fenwick .
29. Tu. Dine at Hollis's , with Planta & Mansel .
7. W. Finish the foreign history.

8. Th.
W. Webb calls.

13. Tu. Dine at Hollis's , with Stovin, Lindsey & J H . Call on Mrs Webb
&
B. Hollis
. See Paradise .

14. W.
French Revolution : Stanhope; Sheridan, Tooke, O'Brien, B. Hollis, Geddes, Lindsey, Price, Paradise : sup with Fawcet . “We are particularly fortunate in having you among us; it is having the best cause countenanced by the man, by whom we most wished to see it supported.”
15. Th. Send away 12 pages: Holcroft calls.

23. F.
J. Hollis calls.

24. Sa.
Convention between England and Spain
.

27. Tu. Dine at Hollis's , with Disney, Planta, Towers & J. Hollis . Peace between Hungary & Prussia .
Netherlands sacrificed by The allies.
29. Th. Finish N. A. R. 60 pages, early this morning. Holcroft sups.
30. F. Finish correcting the copy: two o'clock.
31. Sa. Go to Blackwal, with Holcroft.

ab.seg: Dine at Robinson's : Monkhouse. “I do not think H. too great for the drudgery of translation. There is no comparison between you and him.”

emph.ref: D'Orleans & Mirabeau accused by the Châtelet to the National Assembly

div.ab: Aug. 8. Su. Dine at Fenwick's , with Holcroft . See Paradise .
10. Tu. Dine at Hollis , with Russel & Towers .
Aug. 15. Su. Dine at Holcroft , with Fenwick .

ab.ref: T. C. bled, & c. Dr Lister

div.ab:
20. F.
sanguis pulmonaria. Call on Dr Lister
.

Aug. 22. Su. Dine at Holcroft's
: sup with him at Fenwick's
.

23. M.
Dr Lister calls. Blister .
24. Tu. Dine at Hollis's , with Stovin, Fraser, Garbet junr & J H .

emph.ref: Family Compact adopted by the National Assembly

div.ab:
27. Fr.
Dr Lister calls.

Aug. 29. Su.
Holcroft dines.

30. M.
Dr Lister calls.

ab.seg: Dine at Holcroft's , with Robinson, Perry, Gray, Otley, Webb & Shaw

div.ab:
3. F.
J Hollis calls:
Dr Lister calls.
6. M. Act. 4.
7. Tu. Dine at Hollis's , with Disney, Stovin & J Hollis . Barry au soir.
11. Sa. Dr Lister calls.
13. M. Go to Richmond with Holcroft .
14. Tu. Dine at Hollis's , with Montgomery, Anthony, & J Hollis . Barry au soir.

25. Sa.
W. Webb calls.

Sep. 26. Su. Dine at Holcroft's
: sup with him at Fenwick's
.
28. Tu. Dine at Hollis , with Mansel & Towers .

Oct. 1. F. Call at Webb's, fr
.
5. Tu. Call on Mr Latter morning & afternoon.

Oct. 10. Su. Dine at Holcroft's
: note from Latter .

11. M.
Mrs Cooper for Barnet .
12. Tu. Dine at Hollis's , with Belsham & Towers : see Lindsey .

13. W.
Dr Lister calls.

Oct. 17. Su. Dine at Holcroft's
.

20. W. Tea miss Williams's , with Holcroft, col. Barry, & Aboyne & mrs Elliot . sup at Holcroft's
. Motion for the removal of ministers rejected 403 \ 340

21. Th.
See the pictures at the Adelphi with Holcroft
: dine with him
: Nicholson au soir.

Oct. 24. Su. Di
Holcroft dines.
27. W. Dine at Holcroft's , with Fenwick & Simmons .
Nov. 1 Su. Dine at Holcroft's , with Fenwick . Mrs H. dies.

3.Tu. Dine at Hollis , with Kippis, Towers, Garbets & J Hollis . Inquest.
Holcroft sups.

4. W. Dine at Holcroft's , with Fenwick . Funeral.
Shield drinks tea with me . Dr Lister calls.

5. Th.
Revolution Society . Price in the chair. Motion by Tooke against nobility: pro. Cooper, Sharpe, Favel: con. Rees, Watson, Towers, Perry, Price—Garrow
.

11. W. Carry my ms to col. Barry
: call on Mrs Webb fr.
Act. 1.

17.Tu.
Col. Barry calls. Dine at Hollis's , with Planta, Perkins & J. H.
Carry My ms to Nicholson .

19. Th.
Dr Lister calls.

20. F. Dine at Holcroft's
.

Nov. 21. Su. Dine at Holcroft's
. Act. 2.

23. Tu.
Venice Preserved, Dibdin's Divert .
26. F. Tea miss Williams's , with Holcroft & Ellison .
27. Sa. Extreme cold.

Nov. 28. Su. Dine at Holcroft's
.

30. Tu. Call on Nicholson
: Dine at Hollis' , with Belcham, Lindsey, Caldecot, Perkins & J. H.
Barry au soir.
8. W. Dine at Holcroft's , with Fenwick, Simmons & Bond .

14. Tu.
Grecian Daughter. Death of Timothy Hollis .
21. Tu. Dine at B. Hollis's , with Disney, Thorkelin, Jennings & Mortimer . Towers au soir.

22. W. Call on J Hollis
&
Robinson
: see Mrs Paradise (87) , Mr Edwards (5) & B. Hollis . Dine at Holcrofts, his b. d. 45 or 6.

23. Th.
Robinson calls.
Dec. 26. Su. Dine at Holcroft's , with Fenwick .

27. M.
DrLister calls. 4 months. Dine at Steele's , with Lloyd, Trusson & Rutherford .

ab.add: The story whole in alternate letters between told two confidantes: Miss Woodley relating the story of Dorriforth, & the other the story of Rushbrook
It was in this year that I read & criticised the Simple Story in ms.
